name: Lifeliqe VR Museum
description: Lifeliqe VR Museum brings Lifeliqe's interactive learning experiences into VR for the first time! Learn about a cell, join ancient dinosaurs for a walk, or visit a prehistoric settlement that dates back to the seventh millennium B.C.
